mapper.insert: INSERT INTO nfcomment (nf_seq, nfc_id, nfc_content, nfc_date) VALUES (#{nf_seq}, #{nfc_id}, #{nfc_content}, #{nfc_date})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM nfcomment WHERE nf_seq = #{nf_seq} AND nfc_seq = #{nfc_seq}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM nfcomment, users WHERE nf_seq = #{nf_seq} and nfc_id = us_id ORDER BY nfc_seq DESC
